expression: zip(cross_join(split(userIds,','), split(departments,';')), '.', substring(split(roles,','), 1, 3), (equals(substring(split(departments,';'), 1, 2), 'IT') ? (baseSalary + bonus > '100000' & experience >= '5' & equals(substring(certifications,1,3), 'AWS') ? '_senior_tech' : '_tech') : (experience > '10' ? '_senior_ops' : '_ops')), '@', domain)
